messages.subject: TV Talk
messages.msgSnippet: ***But I worry more about a family without any bike, park, vaudeville show who ... you can t ... AACCKK!  Our tv isn t working right now.  One of those
messages.messageBody:
***But I worry more about a family without any bike, park, vaudeville
show who
> just lies and says the TV doesn't work, or says yes it works, but
you can't
> watch it.***

AACCKK! Our tv isn't working right now. One of those satellite
systems. I don't know what's wrong, been on the phone for 2 hours last
evening and this morning, they want to charge me a small fortune to have
someone come over and check it (no where for me to take it in around
here). And the soonest they can get here is Saturday afternoon.

The kids don't care - I'm dying. I'm going to miss all my shows on BBC
America!

Kate
